title: Sharon Osbourne was transported to a hospital after an emergency call
description: Television personality Sharon Osbourne was transported to a southern California hospital Friday night after an emergency call, police said.

title: 'Very hurtful': CNN contributors react to university chancellor's racist remarks
description: CNN contributors Shan Wu and Lisa Ling join anchor Amara Walker to discuss the racist remarks made by Thomas L. Keon, the chancellor of Purdue University Northwest, during a commencement speech. The chancellor was following the keynote speaker who referenced using "made up languages" to his grandchildren several times in his speech, which made no mention or reference to Asians.

title: The real cost of sponsoring this World Cup
Moscow appeals for army recruits to fight in Ukraine
description: Moscow has begun a new campaign to encourage Russians to enlist in the armed forces and fight in Ukraine, despite the Kremlin having denied needing more recruits.

title: Officials capture iconic mountain lion in Los Angeles
description: A mountain lion that attacked and killed a Los Angeles resident's chihuahua the month before has been captured, the California Department of Fish and Wildlife and the National Park Service.

title: Croatia beats Morocco in World Cup third-place playoff match
description: Croatia beat Morocco 2-1 in the third-place playoff on Saturday as the African side's historic 2022 World Cup ended in defeat.

title: Elon Musk offers journalists he banned from Twitter ability to return under certain condition
description: New Twitter owner Elon Musk offered several of the journalists he banned from the social media website earlier this week the ability to return to the platform if they deleted the tweets he falsely claimed shared his "exact real-time" location.

title: US student reunites with mother after mystery disappearance
description: US student, who was missing, reunites with mother

title: Morocco and Croatia defied expectations to make deep runs in Qatar
Russia's barrage of missiles leaves many Ukrainians without light, power or heat
Many brands have been caught in the geopolitical crosshairs of Qatar 2022, as the host nation and soccer's world governing body have come under fire
What it's like watching Messi and Mbappé in person at Qatar 2022
description: Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbappé have arguably been the two best players at Qatar 2022 and the two will come head-to-head in the World Cup final on Sunday.

title: 5 million people under winter weather alerts in the US
description: After a nor'easter dropped more than a foot of snow across many parts of interior New England, more is on its way Saturday as officials warn of dangerous travel conditions the weekend before Christmas.

title: Water supply and metro services restored in Kyiv but many remain without heat after missile attacks
description: Water supply and metro services have been restored in Kyiv but officials continued to work Saturday to return heating to all the Ukrainian capital's residents, a day after a barrage of Russian missiles targeted the city.

title: Why the UK has fallen into a travel black hole
28 blades pulled from carry-on luggage
description: This week in travel: the world's top destinations for festive cheer, the high-rolling lifestyle in Monaco and Italy, a bag full of knives, and the places you won't be able to visit in 2023.

title: A billionaire couple were found dead by their swimming pool. Relatives are offering $35M to help catch their killer
description: The deaths of Canadian billionaires Barry and Honey Sherman have been shrouded in mystery from the beginning.

title: Self-exiled Philippine communist leader Sison dies at 83
description: Philippine communist leader Jose Maria Sison died on Friday night at the age of 83 after a two-week confinement in a hospital in the Netherlands, his party said on Saturday.

title: These two planets are made of water, study says
description: Two far-off planets are likely made of water, according to research conducted using NASA's Hubble and Spitzer telescopes.

title: Taiwan's military has a problem: as China fears grow, recruitment pool shrinks
description: Taiwan has noticed a hole in its defense plans that is steadily getting bigger. And it's not one easily plugged by boosting the budget or buying more weapons.

title: Haberman: Trump insiders say he sees 2024 campaign as a shield
description: CNN political analyst Maggie Haberman discusses Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign and what Trump's inner circle has to say about it.

title: Opinion: Twitter just reached a new low
description: On Thursday, Elon Musk's ownership of Twitter entered a terrifying new phase when he began wielding his power to censor the press. The Twitter accounts of several journalists who have covered Musk critically recently — in other words, done their jobs — were suspended.

title: As public anger mounts, Peru's lawmakers reject reform needed to hold early elections
description: As Peru explodes in protest with supporters of its former president taking to streets, lawmakers on Friday rejected a constitutional reform that is needed to hold early general elections in 2023.
